arStrings.szText:
{icon:bullet} When your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c} an enemy, you spawn {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"]{/c} Volatile Blood Drops. Collecting a Volatile Blood Drop causes it to explode, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage around you.

{icon:bullet} Every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"]{/c} seconds, your next Skill is guaranteed to {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}.
You spawn Volatile Blood Drops when your {c_important}Core{/c} Skills {c_important}{u}Overpower{/u}{/c}. Collecting Volatile Blood deals {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Physical damage.
